categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: At some point following the Battle of Yavin, Leia Organa and Luke Skywalker went on an undercover diplomatic mission to the planet of Tibrin, on the edge of the Hadar sector. Posing as diplomats from Naboo's House Berenko seeking to negotiate a trade deal, they aimed to rally the native Ishi Tib to the Alliance to Restore the Republic's cause.
